title: TLS handshake errors with 102.13.1
content: Since upgrading to the recent release I am getting TLS handshake errors and am not able to download any mail from my imap server. This is new behavior, as everything had been working before. Any suggestions would be appreciated. Server is dovecot. Thunderbird is running on kubuntu 22.04, though I see the same behavior on MacOS.
creator: steve554

title: Inbox does not display or show any emails
content: I just want to use my inbox
creator: josephm.diza
